name: Crimson Mist
movement: hover and walk speed of 60 ft.
description: The Crimson Mist is a spectral, weightless creature resembling a vampire combined with mist, known for its chaotic and evil presence, hovering ominously.
memorable: It siphons vitality from living beings by reducing their hit point maximum while healing itself, making it a dangerous adversary.
goals: To drain the life force of living creatures and recover its own health.
relations: Often associated with other undead creatures or dark beings, it may serve as a minion to more powerful vampires.
environment: Typically found in dark, abandoned places, or haunting locales away from sunlight.
strengths: Immunities to cold, necrotic, and poison damage; it can also move through spaces occupied by other creatures.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to sunlight, which deals damage and imposes disadvantage on its attacks; cannot enter residences without invitation.
attacks: Engulfs living creatures, dealing necrotic damage while restraining them, leveraging its weightless form strategically.
most_powerful_ability: Sanguine Feast, which reduces a creature's hit point maximum while healing the Crimson Mist with necrotic damage dealt.
additional_information: Cannot enter a residence without invitation.
Takes damage when in running water.
Causes death if a creature's hit point maximum is reduced to 0.
Only one creature can be engulfed at a time, adding strategic importance.
Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks in sunlight.
test_queries: spectral vampire-like creature with mist form
malevolent undead draining life from victims
crimson mist that heals from necrotic damage
weightless monster that engulfs living beings
